price: Dhugumatti, (Qur’aana) kana keessa ergaa ga'aa ta’etu orma (Rabbiin) gabbaraniif jira.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي هَٰذَا لَبَلَٰغٗا لِّقَوۡمٍ عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna fī hādhā labalāghan liqawmin ʿābidīna
